alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Douglas; North Fulton; Paulding; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Paulding, southwestern Cobb, Douglas and central Fulton Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 700 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over New Georgia, or 8 miles south of Dallas, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Douglasville, City of South Fulton, Smyrna, Villa Rica, Powder Springs, Austell, Hiram, Lithia Springs, Sweetwater Creek State Park, Brownsville, Chapel Hill, Six Flags Over Georgia, Winston, Lake Val-Do-Mar, New Georgia, Sandtown and Mableton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Cobb; Douglas; North Fulton; Paulding; South Fulton
